about.bio: I am a software and game developer, focused on learning new skills and developing new projects. I enjoy creating small games in Godot, Unity and Unreal Engine, for game jams but also for fun. In my spare time, I love to play games and to play drums. I studied programming in Alessandria, Italy, and I now work full-time as a Software developer.
about.tagline: We don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents
